remedies.name: Simple name or mantra repetition
remedies.description: Spend 5â€“10 minutes daily repeating a peaceful name or short mantra that naturally uplifts you.
remedies.safety_notes: There are no rigid rules; practice in a way that feels respectful and sincere to you.

remedies.name: Quiet sitting with intention
remedies.description: Sit quietly for a few minutes each day with the intention to be present and available to deeper guidance, without forcing any experience.
remedies.safety_notes: If strong emotions arise, consider seeking support from a trusted guide or professional.

remedies.name: Offer support to genuine spiritual work
remedies.description: From time to time, support teachers, centers or initiatives that you feel are genuinely working for upliftment.
remedies.safety_notes: Support only paths and teachers you personally resonate with and trust.

remedies.name: Selfless act of service
remedies.description: Choose a small, selfless act of service that you can do regularly without expectation of return.
remedies.safety_notes: Do not compromise your own basic needs or safety while serving others.

remedies.name: Gratitude reflection
remedies.description: At the end of the day, recall one or two moments you felt supported or guided, and mentally offer gratitude.
remedies.safety_notes: This is an inner contemplation; there is no right or wrong way to feel.

remedies.name: Quiet support for contemplative spaces
remedies.description: Offer simple, unobtrusive support to spaces such as libraries, retreat centers or places of reflection that help people turn inward.
remedies.safety_notes: Support only environments you feel are ethical and balanced; avoid groups that pressure or manipulate.

remedies.name: Nature contemplation
remedies.description: When possible, sit quietly in a natural setting, noticing patterns in the sky, trees or water, and allowing a sense of connection to something larger.
remedies.safety_notes: Choose safe outdoor locations and protect yourself from harsh weather or environmental risks.
